'''Melara Hetherspoon'''Â is character inÂ the [[Season 5|fifth season]]. She will be portrayed by [[Isabella Steinbarth]].<ref>[http://watchersonthewall.com/sources-report-jodhi-may-joins-cast-game-thrones/]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Melara Hetherspoon is a daughter of Ser Tybolt Hetherspoon, the head of [[House Hetherspoon]], and a childhood friend of [[Cersei Lannister]].
